page.title: 05Lee Schofield's Diary
page.content: This is my diary for{15th May 1985. I get up at 8,oclock.I get washed while my mum gets my clothes ready. Then I get ready and I brush my hair and then have my breakfast.After break fast I get my coat on and get ready for school.sometimes I get a lift but mostly I walk.It takes 15 minutes from my house to school.My school is called {Anston Greenlands school.}It is a nice school.It has about{200 pupils.}Our head teacher is called Mr Fretwell. He has an office at the right end of the school.The classrooms are on the left side of the building.We have one {BBC computer.}This is what we do our {Domesday project}on.We go in the hall every day except monday at 10 15. But on monday it is just the infant assembly.Then after we all go out to play at half past 10 we come in at 45 minutes past.Then we work until
